name: Raspberry Pi 4, 4GB RAM
description: Single-board computer for running operating systems and projects.Features a quad-core ARM Cortex-A72 CPU and multiple USB ports.Ideal for IoT, media servers, and automation projects.

name: Micro HDMI to HDMI Cable
description: Connects Raspberry Pi to a display.Supports high-definition video and audio transmission.Used for connecting to monitors, TVs, and projectors.

name: Raspberry Pi Camera Module V2
description: Captures photos and videos.8-megapixel resolution with fixed focus lens.Commonly used for surveillance, AI vision, and photography projects.

name: Argon One V2 Metal Fan Case
description: Protects Raspberry Pi and provides cooling.Made of aluminum with active and passive cooling.Great for preventing overheating during long processing tasks.

name: Raspberry Pi USB C Power Adapter with Switch
description: Powers the Raspberry Pi with on/off control.Provides stable 5V 3A power supply.Useful for safe startup and shutdown of Raspberry Pi.

name: SanDisk Ultra 32GB MicroSD Preinstalled Raspberry Pi OS
description: Storage for Raspberry Pi OS and files.Class 10 card with fast read/write speeds.Used to quickly set up Raspberry Pi with preloaded OS.

name: Arduino UNO R3
description: Microcontroller board for controlling electronics.Based on ATmega328P with 14 digital I/O pins.Popular for robotics, sensors, and automation control.

name: 4WD Smart Robot Car Chassis Kit
description:
Base frame for building a four-wheel robot.
Includes motors, wheels, and acrylic frame.
Perfect for obstacle avoidance and path-following robots.

name: Red, White, and Green LED
description:
Emit light in red, white, or green.
Operates at low voltage with long lifespan.
Used for indicators, signals, and decorative lighting.

name: Buzzer
description:
Produces sound or alerts.
Operates on DC voltage and compact in size.
Ideal for alarms, timers, and status notifications.

name: Wires (Male, Female, and Normal)
description:
Connect electronic components.
Flexible jumper wires for breadboards and modules.
Used for prototyping and quick testing of circuits.

name: Breadboard (Full)
description:
Prototype electronic circuits without soldering.
Has multiple tie points and power rails.
Ideal for learning electronics and quick experiments.

name: Push Button Switch (2 Pin)
description:
Turns a circuit on or off when pressed.
Compact and easy to mount on breadboards.
Used for resets, inputs, and manual controls.

name: Potentiometer 100k
description:
Adjusts resistance to control voltage or signal.
Rotary knob for smooth control.
Used in volume control, sensors, and tuning circuits.

name: 7-Segment Common Cathode Display
description:
Displays numbers and some characters.
Low-power LED display with 8 segments.
Used in clocks, counters, and scoreboards.

name: LCD Display 16x2 with Header
description:
Displays text in 2 rows of 16 characters.
Works with parallel or I2C connection.
Common in DIY gadgets, meters, and menus.

name: Hex Keypad
description:
Inputs numbers or commands via buttons.
4x4 matrix keypad with tactile feedback.
Used for password entry and control panels.

name: Motor Shield L293D
description:
Controls DC and stepper motors.
Supports bidirectional control for 4 motors.
Perfect for robotics and motorized projects.

name: 5V Relay Module (Double Channel)
description:
Switches high-voltage devices on and off.
Opto-isolated inputs for safety.
Used for home automation and industrial control.

name: Resistors 10k
description:
Limit current flow in circuits.
Standard tolerance and compact size.
Used for voltage division and current limiting.

name: 5V 2000 RPM DC Motor
description:
Converts electrical energy to rotational motion.
High-speed motor with metal shaft.
Used in robotics, fans, and automation.

name: Servo Motor
description:
Rotates to a specific position.
Controlled via PWM signal.
Common in robotics, cameras, and actuators.

name: Mini DC 4-12V Water Pump Motor
description:
Pumps water in small systems.
Compact design for portable devices.
Used in fountains, cooling, and aquaponics.

name: Ultrasonic Sensor HC-SR04
description:
Measures distance using sound waves.
Range of 2cm to 4m with high accuracy.
Used in robots, parking systems, and obstacle detection.

name: Bluetooth Module HC-05
description:
Enables wireless communication via Bluetooth.
Supports master and slave modes.
Used for data transfer between Arduino and phones.

name: ESP8266 ESP-01 WiFi Module
description:
Connects devices to WiFi networks.
Has TCP/IP protocol stack and serial interface.
Used for IoT and web-based control projects.

name: Temperature and Humidity Sensor DHT11
description:
Measures temperature and humidity.
Digital output for easy interfacing.
Used in weather stations and environmental monitoring.

name: IR Infrared Obstacle Avoidance Sensor
description:
Detects nearby objects using infrared light.
Adjustable sensitivity via potentiometer.
Used in robots and automation systems.

name: SIM800L Mini GPRS GSM Module
description:
Sends and receives data/calls via cellular networks.
Operates on 2G GSM with low power.
Used for SMS alerts, GPS, and IoT.

name: Mini Cooling Fan 40x40x10mm
description:
Provides cooling for electronics.
Operates on 5V DC with low noise.
Used in Raspberry Pi cases, 3D printers, and PCs.

name: LM30 Temperature Sensor
description:
Measures temperature.
Analog output with high accuracy.
Used in HVAC, weather, and industrial systems.

name: PIR Sensor
description:
Detects motion using infrared radiation.
Has adjustable delay and sensitivity.
Used in security alarms and motion-triggered devices.

name: Pulse Oximeter Sensor
description:
Measures blood oxygen level and pulse rate.
Uses light absorption through fingertip.
Used in health monitoring and wearable devices.

name: RTC Module
description:
Keeps track of real-time clock and date.
Has battery backup for continuous timekeeping.
Used in clocks, loggers, and scheduling systems.
